import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {api} from "../../api" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" function Appoinment({props}) { const { id } = useParams(); const [form, setForm] = useState({}); var todayDate = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // console.log(form); } useEffect(() => { api.getAppoinmentById(id).then((res) => { setForm(res); }); }, [id]); return ( <>

Please Fill the All the Appoinment details and check Slots of Doctor.
